forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 73. South southwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy smoke before 11am, then patchy smoke and isolated rain showers between 11am and 2pm, then patchy smoke and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy smoke and a chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then haze and a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 8pm, then haze and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 60. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then haze and showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 8am, then haze and scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 69. North northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
